title: 1stAeon
author: 1stAeon
content: Today, 1st Aeon, a leading Bitcoin technology company, is thrilled to announce the public release of its groundbreaking platform designed to cater to the ORC20 ecosystem on Bitcoin. The experience is designed to empower users to engage all ORC20 tokens available and soon provide a single source for pioneers to deploy, mint, transfer and store these tokens.ORC20 tokens are similar to BRC20 tokens and both have helped the Bitcoin network gain significant traction recently. The standard for both is represented as files inscribed onto satoshis with an Ordinal serial number. Each satoshi, the smallest unit of Bitcoin, equals 0.00000001 BTC. However, ORC20 improves adaptability, scalability, and security while maintaining backward compatibility with BRC20.From today, visitors to 1st Aeon can unlock a user-friendly Explorer interface to search all deployed ORC20 tokens. Tokens that have been minted are sorted by deployment date and each token Tick offers a wealth of information on number of holders, number of transactions, and progress towards completed inscription.In the next phase of 1st Aeonâ€™s platform, users will find enhanced utility including decentralized access to deploying, minting, sending, canceling, and upgrading ORC20 tokens. 1st Aeon aims to facilitate broad access and adoption of ordinals and enhance the features of ORC20 on the Bitcoin network. With its state-of-the-art technology and commitment to excellence, 1st Aeon will play a pivotal role in shaping the future and pushing the boundaries of token standards in the Bitcoin ecosystem.For more information about 1st Aeon and its innovative platform for Bitcoin ORC20, please visit www.1ae.io.About 1st Aeon:1st Aeon is a blockchain technology company focused on developing innovative solutions for the Bitcoin blockchain. The company is dedicated to advancing standards and creating user-friendly platforms that enhance security and increase scalability. With a team of experts in blockchain technology, 1st Aeon strives to push the boundaries of what is possible in the digital asset space.For more updates and information, join our socials: Twitter (https://twitter.com/1st_Aeon), Discord (https://discord.com/invite/BDjBQ9EuBM) and Telegram (https://t.me/FirstAeon -announcements).

comments.author: Rivaldine
comments.body: Its good to see loads of evolution in the space but the rise of ordinals still remains a mystery to be unraveled in my own view. Looking at the Aeon project, I was hoping to get a more comprehensive detail about the project and also when and where we can get the native currency. Being an early investor in projects such as this still remains the best approach to investment but can we know the VCs behind, if there is any.
